product_name: freshLotus Youth Preserve Radiance Renewal Night Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackFresh's Lotus Youth Preserve Radiance Renewal Night Cream is an antioxidant that helps to recover & reduce signs of fatigue while smoothing fine lines & improving radiance.
details: DetailsBenefitsSmoothes lines & texture and improves radianceRecovers & reduces signs of fatigueMinimizes visible poresKey IngredientsSuper Lotus smoothes lines & texture and helps to boost radiancePeach leaf extract works to comforts to help skin recover overnightPolyglutamic acid works to lock in moisture & comfortVitamin E helps protect & sootheResearch ResultsAfter 1 night, consumers saw, +28% radiance*After 28 nights, consumers saw +55% radiance** +36% smoother lines** -22% signs of fatigue** -62% visible pores****observed results, self-assessment by scoring, 32 subjects, 1 night**observed results, self-assessment by scoring, 32 subjects, 4 weeks***observed results, self-assessment by scoring, 20 subjects, 4 weeksItem 2617056How To UseApply to clean skin before bed. Can be used nightly.IngredientsAqua (water), Glycerin, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/dicaprate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Diglycerin, Myristyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (shea) Butter, Nelumbo Nucifera Extract, Prunus Persica (peach) Leaf Extract, Citrus Limon (lemon) Peel Oil, Cucumis Sativus (cucumber) Fruit Extract, Glycine Soja (soybean) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Cetyl Palmitate, Cocoglycerides, Acrylates/c10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Parfum (fragrance), Sodium Polyglutamate, Sodium Hydroxide, 1,2-hexanediol, Sodium Phytate, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Citral, Linalool \<18941\>.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to clean skin before bed. Can be used nightly.

reviews.headline: Left me wanting more...
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for a few weeks now and I have noticed little change.  The only thing this product has helped is maybe some redness and my skin looks a bit tighter.  This product is heavily scented which I believe caused me to break out.  I do not wake up glowy or even feel my skin deeply hydrated in the morning. Tried pairing this with hyaluronic acid to see if that would help but it made my skin burn by combining those two ingredients...

reviews.headline: Great night cream
reviews.comments: Seems to be a great improvement in my skintone over all. Will buy this again. As an added bonus it smells great, like tropical fruit, guava and mango.

reviews.headline: Lovely cream
reviews.comments: Honestly, the main reason I bought this mini cream was the scent. I didn't even care if it did anything else. I figured it was good because of the price and I did see a lot of positive reviews. Some people say the scent was different before, but I cannot vouch for that as I am a first time buyer. It has a very light, natural peachy smell. I usually don't like fake peach smell, but this was just right. It is a rich, moisturizing cream and in the morning my skin feels rested and nourished. This is the last thing I put on at night and it sure feels like a treat. I highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: Strong scent
reviews.comments: This cream goes on smooth, non greasy and soaks in quickly, however, the scent is very strong and over powering. If it wasnt for the strong scent, I would really like it.

reviews.headline: Luxurious night cream
reviews.comments: I tried a sample and I was hooked. This is an amazingly luxurious night cream. It is thick in texture and lightly fragranced with the scent of freshness. I am always impressed with how moisturizing it is. It feels so soft on my skin and I am happy to have found it.

reviews.headline: Extremely Moisturizing
reviews.comments: Loved this night cream...very, very rich!

reviews.headline: The Smell is intoxicating!
reviews.comments: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Gives deep hydration and the smell is gorgeous! So nice! Obsessed!!!

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments:
Took me a few times to realize a tiny bit goes a long way but the scent is soooo nice!
My skin is soft and when I wake up I glow!  Ive gotten so many compliments on my skin and I recommend this product every time. 
Ive used every night the last three weeks and its really the best night cream ive had!

reviews.headline: Wanted to Love
reviews.comments: I love the rose collection, so I wanted to try the lotus cream. It is a nice texture in a beautiful jar, but is heavily fragranced. After one use, I woke up with a red pimple on my cheek and my pores appeared larger.  I will only use on my neck now.

reviews.headline: It's just right
reviews.comments: As I age, I notice I need a bit more heavy face creams. However, I don't want to over do it. I'm in my late 40's and this face cream really helped me to feel youthful again. I combine it with the tea tree serum. I feel perfectly hydrated without being weighed down.

reviews.headline: Phenomenal smoothing with moistire
reviews.comments: Bought the full-size jar after receiving a sample. It's a nice weight without feeling heavy or greasy. Light, pleasant scent. I use it after washing my face at night. Provides ample moisture and skin smoothing and plumping overnight.

reviews.headline: My Skin Loves This
reviews.comments:
Hi Everyone!

So, I very rarely write reviews but this product deserves one. I've been using this product for a little over a week now and it's saved my skin. A little bit about me and my skin concerns: I'm 38, latina with tan skin, no wrinkles but a few fine lines around the corners of my lips. I struggle with eczema on my eyebrows, around my nose and chin. When I started using this cream, I had been dealing with a flare up that was into its 2nd week. üò´ I applied this the same night that I picked it up. Immediately, I noticed the lemony scent and silky feel on my skin. I had no stinging or burning. The next morning, MY FACE WAS CLEAR. No patches, no angry flare up. My skin was glowing and supple. It's been very hot in NJ and I've even used this twice a day with no adverse reaction. My skin looks so much better and that makes me happy. Thank you fresh for this amazing product. I love it. ü©∑

reviews.headline: Sensitive, acne prone skin beware!
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this, as I tried the lotus day cream in the past and loved it! This time, I got this in the gift set from Ulta (the one you get with minimum purchase), and I am happy I didn't purchase the full size. The cream has a nice texture and smell but it made me break out terribly!!! I definitely wouldn't recommend to sensitive acne prone skin people. Very disappointing.

reviews.headline: Formula Smell Changed
reviews.comments: I have years using this cream. Ordered new one, when I applied it I did noticed the smell was different, I thought was expired. Looks like lots of customers are complaining about a formula changed ? So sad, now I have to find a replacement brand.

reviews.headline: Favorite lotion
reviews.comments: This became my new favorite lotion so quick! Super moisturizing but feels light still. Has the best smell ever (not too strong). Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: patch test!
reviews.comments: i made the mistake of not doing a patch test. my face broke out from this really bad. it also has a weird strong fruity fragrance??

reviews.headline: Wanted to love!
reviews.comments: Personally its clogging for me. My skin doesnt react to dimethicone well in larger quantities. Been loving this as an eye cream though, the antioxidants and skin firming has been a pro in the morning.

reviews.headline: Great everyday lotion
reviews.comments: This lotion is lightweight yet keeps my face moisturized all day long. It does well under makeup. The packaging is elegant and a little goes a long ways. I will be repurchasing

media.headline: Left me with a more radiant & youthful complexion
media.caption: 2 wks of using the new lotus youth preserve face cream

media.headline: So hydrating that I only need it before bed
media.caption: Comforting my face before bed

faceoff_positive.comments: For starters, I noticed a slight fragrance to the cream upon taking the lid off.   I was always told face creams should never smell, and I used it anyway on my combination skin type.  My skin took a while to fade away all the red spots that formed after applying it to my skin.  Im not sure if it's related to the fragrance ingredient part but my skin did completely return to its normal color after almost 8 minutes of applying it. The texture of the cream is like a thick but whipped silk like moisturizer that easily spreads over my face and neck.   Although it's recommended to use morning and night, I have been only using this after my shower and before bed.  I wait a few minutes before laying my face onto the pillowcase to make sure my skin soaked up my cream. I can say this left my skin feeling soft the following morning where I didn't need to apply more after waking up. I didn't get any irritated feelings; just red spots around my face that vanished away.  I usually get pink on the apples of my cheek when I apply creams so this part of my honest feedback isn't to be alarming. The price tag makes sense for me because this cream isn't heavy to the touch but feels thick on the skin making it perfect for cold months.   I really like this cream for how much is in the package.  Key take away,  a little goes a long way so the package may appear small but there's a lot of product that goes a long way in here. Age slow and happy ‚ù§Ô∏è
faceoff_positive.headline: So hydrating that I only need it before bed

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this product gifted by freshbeauty free in exchange for my honest review. First I should say I do have quite sensitive skin. Sometimes changes in my skincare routine can be irritating, but usually just adding one new thing isn't a problem. I also have acne prone skin but usually only breakout hormonally now. That being said, I seem to be one of the few who doesn't really like this product. I can't be 100% sure (because again, I sometimes breakout hormonal or my acne goes through strange phases) but I'm almost positive that this product severely irritated my skin. I think it's safe to assume that it was probably mostly the heavy fragrance in this product and likely some other ingredients that caused it. The first time I used it I didn't really notice a problem but the second time I noticed my cheeks immediately turned red and blotchy - I should have washed it off but didn't. My skin also just felt irritated and slightly itchy. Now I'm experiencing acne all over my cheeks and chin. Possibly some hormonal right now too, but this product definitely amplified the breakout. I don't plan on using it again so as to not risk any further irritation. I really would have hoped by now brands - especially EXPENSIVE skincare - would STOP putting fragrance in products.. please. It's not necessary and sensitive skin people like me can't use the product. Even if it's a more natural fragrance from the lotus and other ingredients which I assume it mostly is - it's strong and irritating to my skin. Again, it's likely other ingredients irritating my skin as well but I guess we'll never know for sure.
faceoff_negative.headline: Irritated skin - broke out

rollup.name: Lotus Youth Preserve Radiance Renewal Night Cream
